panes.headline: We set out with a mission to make all the world’s art freely accessible to anyone with an Internet connection
To fulfill this mission we are building the largest public database of art for educational use…
…and making it possible to find and collect art and design from galleries around the world—all in one place.
Galleries uploaded over 120,000 for sale works…
We made 50,000 introductions between galleries and collectors.
Galleries and Museums uploaded over 1,2000 shows…
…bringing access to more than 100,000 works from their collections

conclusion.message: Thank you everyone who made this possible. Galleries, Museums, Artists, Non-profits, Scholars, Writers, Designers & Technologists, And You.
